name: Norman Schwarzkopf
description:
Famous Jewish generals:

1) Judah Maccabee
2) Moshe Dayan
3) Ariel Sharon
4) ...

Yes, we're stumped here. Despite the rumors, Eisenhower was not Jewish. Mark Clark, half Jewish at birth, was baptized. Wesley Clark (no relation) is borderline at best. And few have heard of Iona Yakir. Hmmmm... Norman Schwarzkopf? You're kidding, right?
